name: Berserk Engine Tank
description:
Introducing, the newest version of Made-by-Kappa type 2-tori tank! Kappa Science is the Best in the World!!!

Its features include:

  • Heavy duty cannon that fires magical bullets with infinite capacity
    • The cannon can also be charged to shoot charged bullets
  • State of the art engine that can push said this heavy duty tank at a reasonable speed
  • Magical armor that can not only withstand any kind of attacks, but also create extremely destructive shockwave around the tank upon receiving an attack
    • Disclaimer: breaks down after three hits

The engine is still in prototype however... and it seems... it is out of control and so it erratically moves randomly every few seconds. I guess you can still somewhat control the movement of the tank by using the recoil made by its super-heavy cannon though...

After seeing the video and hearing Mark said something along the line of "take something that the player usually has control of and make it out of control" and well... I simply take the simple idea of making the movement out of control -- the player's movement erratically changes every few seconds or so. From that idea I turn it into this game.

I try to polish this game as much as I could in the limited time that I have (since unfortunately I just happen to have a very clumped schedule this weekend). I hope you all enjoy my game

Not exactly the most well balanced game I must admit. Idk the proper spawn rate for the enemies and the items. Sometimes after a while the screen will get cluttered with both of them *chuckle*

Known bug: I don't know why but shooting the cannon is supposed to generate particle effects. In my browser it doesn't appear though... although it appears just fine in Godot.
